title: Colorado National Monument: Hiking
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Hiking               Hiking       Colorado National Monument's trails offer many opportunities for hikers. Bird watchers and photographers discover the splendor that they traveled so far to find. Hikes range from only 0.25 mile to over 14 miles. Click here for a hiking brochure. PETS AND BICYCLES PROHIBITED.  Â     Hiking Lower Monument Trail.
